title: n00dPickups
description: Pick Up the Pace with n00dPickups! Transform how players interact with items in your game. With data-driven customization and full network replication, n00dPickups makes adding pickups a breeze.
longDescription:
n00dPickups: Comprehensive Pickup System for Dynamic Item Handling


Demonstration 📹

Getting Started 📹


Revolutionize item interactions in your game with n00dPickups, a robust and fully network-replicated system designed for seamless pickup management. Ideal for various game genres, this plugin simplifies the process of integrating pickups into your gameplay with powerful, flexible features.





Key Features:


  • Core Pickup Component: Centralized logic for managing all pickup functionalities, including overlapping detection, item spawning, and pickup visibility. Integrate effortlessly into any project.
  • Base Pickup Actor: Designed for inheriting, this actor is the container for the pickup data and represents your item in the world. Not limited to this, you can add the pickup component to your own actors to add the same functionality.
  • Client-side physics for throwables: optimized for hundreds (and potentially thousands) of physics actors thrown into the world. Inspired by ARK: Survival Evolved packages that are thrown from the inventory
  • Data-Driven Design: Use data assets to define pickup properties, including item types, effects, and behavior. Supports easy customization and expansion without modifying core code.
  • Example Blueprints: Includes a range of example blueprints for common pickup types like ammo, health, armor, and weapons. Demonstrates practical implementation, providing a quick start and reference for developers.
  • Replication Support: Full network replication ensures consistent behavior in multiplayer environments, maintaining synchronization across all clients.
  • Customizable Effects: Implement and manage particle effects, sounds, and animations triggered during item pickups, enhancing visual and auditory feedback for players.
  • Dynamic Interaction: Features dynamic pickup behaviors, such as random item generation and conditional pickup requirements, offering flexible and immersive gameplay mechanics.
  • Comprehensive Documentation: Includes detailed guides and examples, facilitating straightforward integration and customization to fit your project’s needs.





Seamless Integration

As part of the n00dWorkshop suite, n00dPickups integrates smoothly with other n00d assets, ensuring a cohesive development experience. Enhance your project’s item handling capabilities with a system designed to adapt and grow with your needs.


n00dPickups empowers developers to implement sophisticated pickup systems effortlessly, transforming item interactions and enhancing gameplay dynamics. Unlock the potential of pickups in your game today!

technicalDetails:
YOU DO NOT NEED TO KNOW C++ TO USE THIS PLUGIN! ALL N00D PLUGINS ARE BLUEPRINT-FIRST, C++ WHERE REQUIRED!



Code Modules:

  • Runtime

 

Number of Blueprints: 4 (excluding examples)

Number of C++ Classes: 1 (Project Settings)

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows 64 bit, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows 64 bit, Linux
